document_name: Strengthening the Capacity of the VN Union of Science and Technology Associations (VUSTA)

outputs.output_descr: Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Associations' capacity to represent its member organisations' interests in government policy-making processes increased; Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Associations' internal governance structure and capacity is improved; Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Association connects its member organisations and reaches out to other stakeholders.

project_descr: STRENGTHENING THE CAPACITY OF VIET NAM UNION OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ASSOCIATIONS (VUSTA)
project_title: VIET NAM UNION OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ASSOCIATIONS
